data.name: VR Sparring Partner
data.description:
VR Sparring Partner is a boxing training application to improve counter attacks from parries and blocks.

The features of this work are as follows.

1.Importance of counterpunching
By parrying or blocking an opponent's punch, the damage inflicted on the opponent is increased for a certain period of time. This allows you to practice quickly connecting from defense to counterpunch.

2.Realistic damage calculations
Realistic damage calculations based on the angle and speed of a punch against an opponent's weak spot allow you to practice punching faster and more accurately.

3.Extensive customization functions
In Ordered Partner mode, you can customize your partner's behavior from a number of options. You can practice repetitive counters to various types of combination punches.

4.Distinctive Partners
There are two types of partners: short-range and long-range. They also vary in the type and speed of the punches they throw, as well as in their physique. You can choose your partner according to your level and objectives.

5.Stance change function
Choose your partner's stance from both orthodox and southpaw. You can choose either orthodox or southpaw stance. This helps you to overcome your weak stance.

By playing this title, which was created to combine both gameplay and training effectiveness, you can perform effective boxing training at home, alone, and in a short period of time.

Now, let's start training!

changelog.change_log: Added two background patterns to choose from.

We have improved the game balance by adding, adjusting and modifying functions in the following items.
*Adjustment of the hit judgments of the player and the opponent.
*Adjustment of the distance between the player and the opponent.
*Player's upper arm is now visible and guarding is now possible.
*Fixed button malfunction at startup.
